segments.text: Ugh, that sink is disgusting, overflowing like a broken pipe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's sloshing everywhere, drenching the floor in a filthy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch—gross negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up there, grubby hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's tilting, covered in who knows what from the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too, probably getting cookie crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole mess is unsanitary, water ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate while standing in filth—revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean outside, but inside it's a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies in this chaos just makes it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this sloppy, hazardous disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that faucet before it's a total pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR
